mapper.select:
select TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_SUBITEMDES , TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_ENABLED , TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_ITEMDES , TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_SUBITEMID
from TP_CGAUTHORITY WHERE 1=1 AND TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_SUBITEMDES IS NOT NULL AND TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_SUBITEMID IS NOT NULL
AND TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_ENABLED like '' || #{cEnabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || ''
AND TP_CGAUTHORITY.C_ITEMDES like '' || #{cItemdes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || ''

update.foreach:
update TP_CGORDERMT
C_AUDITMAN = #{item.cAuditman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_TIMETAKE = #{item.cTimetake,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_AUDITTYPE = #{item.cAudittype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_COMNAME = #{item.cComname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_DEPTAPPLY = #{item.cDeptapply,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ID = #{item.cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_MANAPPLY = #{item.cManapply,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_MITMAN = #{item.cMitman,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_MITTIME = #{item.cMittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_MITTYPE = #{item.cMittype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_ORDERNUM = #{item.cOrdernum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_REMARK = #{item.cRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_STATE = #{item.cState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_TIMEAPPLY = #{item.cTimeapply,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
C_AUDITTIME = #{item.cAudittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
WHERE C_ID = #{item.cId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
